name: Dead or Alive 5 Plus & Dead or Alive Paradise
name_original: Dead or Alive 5 Plus & Dead or Alive Paradise
description:
A bargain bundle of Dead or Alive Paradise（PSP™ system) and the newly released Dead or Alive 5 Plus (PlayStation®Vita system)!

1 player(s)
Ad Hoc Mode 2 Players
Network Players - 2
Network Features
1440KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Dual Analog Sticks
Motion Sensor
Microphone
Cross-platform play (PS3™)

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement and this item's use restrictions. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
